name: Dinomorphia Diplos
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Dinomorphia" card from your Deck to the GY, then if your LP are 2000 or less, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can banish 1 Trap from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Dinomorphia" monster from your GY, except "Dinomorphia Diplos". You can only use each effect of "Dinomorphia Diplos" once per turn.
